text: Julie Gibson (September 6, 1913 - October 2, 2019) was an American former singer and actress. Her career during became popular in the 1940s. In 1937, she joined the cast of Joe Penner's radio program. She made her first movie appearances in small roles in the movies Nice Girl? and The Feminine Touch (both 1941). Her first featured role was in the 1944 movie Lucky Cowboy. Gibson died at her Los Angeles home on October 2, 2019 at the age of 106.Julie Gibson, Singer in 'The Feminine Touch' and 'Hail the Conquering Hero,' Dies at 106 ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1913 births Category:2019 deaths Category:American movie actors Category:American radio actors Category:American centenarians Category:Musicians from Idaho Category:Singers from Idaho Category:Actors from Idaho
title: Julie Gibson
